snippet: Indian federal government representatives will meet the Dalai Lama when he visits a sensitive border region controlled by India but claimed by China, officials said, despite a warning from Beijing that it would damage ties....

headline.main: Peak Gasoline Demand Looms With Engine Efficiency Gains
headline.print_headline: Peak Gasoline Demand Looms With Engine Efficiency Gains

lead_paragraph: Indian federal government representatives will meet the Dalai Lama when he visits a sensitive border region controlled by India but claimed by China, officials said, despite a warning from Beijing that it would damage ties.
